item.title: Quick tip: hosting HTML/CSS/JS demos from source code on GitHub Pages

item.title: WebMCP – a much needed way to make agents play with rather than against the web
item.content:encoded: WebMCP is an exciting W3C proposal that just landed in Chrome Canary to try out. The idea is that you can use some HTML attributes on a form or register JavaScript tool methods to give agents direct access to content.
